name: Norish
short_desc: Norish self-hosted app (web + postgres + redis + headless chrome).
description: Norish with Postgres, Redis and a headless Chrome container. Password auth enabled by default.
author: norishapp

form_fields.label: Norish MASTER_KEY (base64, 32 bytes)
form_fields.hint: Wordt gebruikt als MASTER_KEY. Laat Runtipi dit genereren.

form_fields.label: Postgres password
form_fields.hint: Wachtwoord voor de interne Postgres database.
